about_the_game:
The main character of the "Amane-sama" is a character in the multiverse world.

This work is set in a world where Amane-sama is the strongest magical girl.
This is a heartwarming story in which the strongest magical girl, who should never lose, loses and is trained by mind control magic.

◆ How to set the extra voice (Nejicomi Simulator TMA02 Extension) ◆

The following procedure allows you to play your favorite voice file immediately after the startup of Nejicomi Simulator TMA02.
You can enjoy situation play by setting up your own voice works, etc.

1. create a folder named StartingVoices in the Nejicomi Simulator TMA02 installation folder
2. put the wav file of the voice you want to play at startup in StartingVoices
3. start the application

If you do the above steps in a folder named ComingVoices,
You can also load and play random audio at coming.

content_descriptors.notes: Sensual voice drama with sexual expressions.

detailed_description:
The main character of the "Amane-sama" is a character in the multiverse world.

This work is set in a world where Amane-sama is the strongest magical girl.
This is a heartwarming story in which the strongest magical girl, who should never lose, loses and is trained by mind control magic.

◆ How to set the extra voice (Nejicomi Simulator TMA02 Extension) ◆

The following procedure allows you to play your favorite voice file immediately after the startup of Nejicomi Simulator TMA02.
You can enjoy situation play by setting up your own voice works, etc.

1. create a folder named StartingVoices in the Nejicomi Simulator TMA02 installation folder
2. put the wav file of the voice you want to play at startup in StartingVoices
3. start the application

If you do the above steps in a folder named ComingVoices,
You can also load and play random audio at coming.
